subject: Sports Injuries
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Phillies’ ace, Roy Halladay, spoke from experience when he offered encouragement to the Mets’ Matt Harvey, who was despondent over an injury to his pitching elbow.
snippet: The Phillies’ ace, Roy Halladay, spoke from experience when he offered encouragement to the Mets’ Matt Harvey, who was despondent over an injury to his pitching elbow.
